# CHANGELOG

## v0.1.0 (2024-01-03)

### Features

* Initial release with comprehensive list handling features
* Configurable nested indentation (default: 2 spaces)
* Marker-based list separation
* Blank line list separation for unordered lists
* Loose list control for ordered lists
* Number preservation option
* Always start at one option
* Full test coverage with 93 tests
